RelatedSentence: Northern Ireland retailers have seen a boost in business as footfall rose by 12.8 % in April .
It is the highest recorded figure for the region since the Northern Ireland Retail Consortium ( NIRC ) began its new series in December 2012 - however it was against negative footfall in April 2013 .

RelatedSentence: It was the second month in a row that NI saw positive growth year on year .
